name: SimilarWords
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: similar words
des:
This is an experimental skill that uses Global Vectors algorithm (https://nlp.stanford.edu/projects/glove/) to calculate similarity between two given words.

Icon image courtesy https://www.flickr.com/people/51035609331@N01

Feel free to explore your vocabulary, or challenge yourself to find a pair of words that have the highest/lowest score!
